Title: Game Engine (EmlenMud) Revival/Rewrite
Description: This EmlenMud revival project is an attempt to bring old MUD game code into the 21st century, using new technologies such as C# 3.5, WCF, Silverlight, and LINQ.  This game engine is currently made available for learning purposes only.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This EmlenMud revival project is an attempt to bring old MUD game code into the 21st century, using new technologies such as C# 3.5, WCF, Silverlight, and LINQ. This game engine is currently made available for learning purposes only.

If you would like to help out or have questions, please contact me.
